00034 #ifndef H_DeliberationFilter 
00035 # define H_DeliberationFilter
00036 
00037 # include <PLASMA/Filters.hh>
00038 
00039 namespace TREX {
00040   namespace europa {
00041 
00042     class Assembly;
00043     
00044     class TokenFilter :public EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawFilter {
00045     public:
00046       TokenFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg);
00047       virtual ~TokenFilter() {}
00048       
00049     protected:
00050       bool have_assembly() const {
00051         return NULL!=m_assembly;
00052       }
00053       Assembly const &assembly() const;
00054       
00055       virtual bool doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) =0;
00056       
00057     private:
00058       bool tokenCheck(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00059       
00060       bool test(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity);
00061       void set_assembly(EUROPA::EngineComponentId const &component);
00062       
00063       Assembly *m_assembly;
00064     }; // TREX::europa::TokenFilter
00065     
00066     class DeliberationFilter :public TokenFilter {
00067     public:
00068       DeliberationFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg):TokenFilter(cfg) {}
00069       ~DeliberationFilter() {}
00070       
00071     private:
00072       bool doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00073     };
00074     
00075     class SynchronizationFilter :public TokenFilter {
00076     public:
00077       SynchronizationFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg):TokenFilter(cfg) {}
00078       ~SynchronizationFilter() {}
00079       
00080     private:
00081       bool doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &token);
00082     };
00083 
00084     
00085   } // TREX::europa
00086 } // TREX

00088 #endif // H_DeliberationFilter
